current-chamber.#text: IN THE SENATE OF THE UNITED STATES

official-title.#text: To provide for the redesignation of the Asia-Pacific Center for Security Studies as the Daniel K. Inouye Asia-Pacific Center for Security Studies.

cosponsor.#tail: ) introduced the following bill; which was read twice, considered, read the third time, and passed

header.#text: Redesignation of the Asia-Pacific Center for Security Studies as the Daniel K. Inouye Asia-Pacific Center for Security Studies

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#tail: regional center for security studies known as the Asia-Pacific Center for Security Studies is hereby renamed the

quote.#text: Daniel K. Inouye Asia-Pacific Center for Security Studies

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#tail: , is amended to read as follows:

header.#text: Reference to regional centers for security studies

text.#text: The Daniel K. Inouye Asia-Pacific Center for Security Studies.

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#tail: is amended to read as follows:
{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#text: Subparagraph (B) of section 2611(a)(2) of such title

text.#text: The Daniel K. Inouye Asia-Pacific Center for Security Studies.

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#tail: Asia-Pacific Center for Security Studies in any law, regulation, map, document, record, or other paper of the United States shall be deemed to be a reference to the Daniel K. Inouye Asia-Pacific Center for Security Studies.

{http://purl.org/dc/elements/1.1/}title.#text: 113 S1847 : To provide for the redesignation of the Asia-Pacific Center for Security Studies as the Daniel K. Inouye Asia-Pacific Center for Security Studies.
